metadata.preview:
{/* Грузы */}
            <Card className="bg-gray-800 border-gray-700">
              <CardHeader className="pb-2">
                <CardTitle className="text-white flex items-center gap-2 text-sm">
                  <Truck className="h-3 w-3" />
                  Грузы
                </CardTitle>
              </CardHeader>
              <CardContent className="space-y-2">
                {groupCargosForDisplay(form.cargos).map((group, groupIndex) => (
                   <div key={`group_${groupIndex}`} className="border border-gray-600 rounded p-2">
                    <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-2">
                      <h4 className="text-sm font-medium text-white">
                        {group.isEmpty ? (
                          `Груз №${group.indices[0] + 1}`
                        ) : group.quantity === 1 ? (
                          `Груз №${group.indices[0] + 1}`
                        ) : (
                          `Груз №${group.indices[0] + 1} - ${group.quantity} одинаковых места`
